name: Tech Nottingham April 2022 - Kubernetes, when, why and how?

description.html:
[Full event details on our website](https://nott.tech/tn-apr-22)

**This month Alistair Hey joins us to tell us the when why and how of Kubernetes**
Plus we'll be having fun and giving away swag and prizes.

Join us on zoom:
**[nott.tech/tn-apr-22-zoom](https://nott.tech/tn-apr-22-zoom)**
**Meeting ID: 842 0469 8232**
**Passcode: 980241**

New to Online Tech Nottingham? Read about [what to expect](https://andrew-seward-cz7k.squarespace.com/news/2020/5/6/attending-an-online-tech-nottingham-event).

***

# Kubernetes, when, why and how?

*by Alistair Hey*
We take a look at how kubernetes is changing the way we build systems and the challenges these changes pose

## About Alistair

Alistair helps companies build distributed systems leveraging the latest in cloud and kubernetes

**Win Stuff at Tech Nottingham**

We’ll be giving away some awesome prizes to our lucky attendees. Details on how to win will be shared during the event.

**Join in with the Nottingham Tech Community online**

The Tech Nottingham Slack group is a bustling chat community of Nottingham tech folk sharing ideas, jokes, stories and helping one another. We'd love for you to join in and be a part of it!

Join our Slack group: http://www.technottingham.com/slack

[Full event details on our website](https://nott.tech/tn-apr-22)
